titleStmt.title: We judging it requisite for His Majesties service, that all officers and souldiers of the army in this kingdom, do according to their duty, constantly remain in their respective garrisons and quarters ... by the Lord Lieutenant General and General Governour of Ireland, Essex.
titleStmt.author: Ireland. Lord Lieutenant (1672-1677 : Essex)
Essex, Arthur Capel, Earl of, 1631-1683.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Benjamin Tooke ... and are to be sold by Joseph Wilde ...,

notesStmt.note: Title from first 5 lines of text.
Statement of responsibility transposed from head of title.
"Given at His Majesties castle of Dublin; the 22th of November, 1672. Hen: Ford."
Reproduction of original in the Society of Antiquaries Library, London.
